title: Day 845
content:
# Day 845

It has been a hell of a weekend!

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1812561679341031854](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1812561679341031854)](https://miro.medium.com/1*KpEgxj9JvTVROmLbFa-hrg.png)

Grateful my Baby Mamma said yes and became my Fianc√©. Grateful I got to see Yellowstone which was stunning. Grateful that the soon to be 47th President of The United States is still alive and America avoided what would have likely been a civil war. God is good man. üôè

![A big ass Buffalo booling by the side of the rode](https://miro.medium.com/1*n6OU4n9gToqCbrkwFgX4Mg.png)

![A pretty spot near where I popped the question](https://miro.medium.com/1*C_fGALFHNq04aQn--PUxcA.png)

Hope you enjoyed the photo dump anon üòÄ

7/14/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
